text.section: Subtitle 2 of this title applies in Frederick County.
A gaming event under Subtitle 2 of this title is subject to the requirements of this subtitle.

In addition to the qualified organizations listed in Subtitle 2 of this title, the following organizations and their auxiliaries may conduct activities governed by that subtitle:
a volunteer fire company;
a volunteer rescue company; and
a volunteer ambulance company.
